thread.title: LSU puts powerful running game on display in win over South Caro
thread.title_full: LSU puts powerful running game on display in win over South Caro - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: LSU puts powerful running game on display in win over South Caro
text:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WVUE) - LSUâ€™s offense put on a show Saturday as the No. 7 Tigers compiled over 600 yards of offense, nearly 400 of those yards on the ground, in a 45-24 win over South Carolina.
Despite South Carolina being the home team in the contest, the game was played at Tiger Stadium in Baton Rouge due to flooding damage in Columbia, South Carolina.
The Tigers (5-0, 3-0) were led by Leonard Fournette who finished with 158 yards and one touchdown on 20 carries. Derrius Guice compiled 164 yards and a score on 17 carries and Darrel Williams recorded nine carries for 58 yards and two touchdowns. Brandon Harris completed 18-of-28 passes for 228 yards and two touchdowns.
Quarterback Perry Orth led the Gamecocks (2-4, 0-4) with 201 yards and two scores on 13-of-27 passing.
The Tigers return to action Saturday hosting the No. 11 Florida Gators. Kickoff is set for 6 p.m.
